tool_description: This API returns facts about anything. You pass name of the topic, and the API returns list of the facts. It uses Chat GPT to generate the answer.
name: Interesting Facts API
title: Interesting Facts API

api_list.name: Health Check Endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint returns successful response, if service works fine.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://interesting-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interesting-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://interesting-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "interesting-facts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
